descriptionHtml:
Barbarian 3.1

A replacer for the Draugr armor (Ancient Nord armor)
only male version.

but i think the best combination for womans is to use the saviors hide.
maybe i will do it for the female combinaton.
============================
1.barbarian.txt
2.data folder 
copy 1. (barbarian.txt  file)  and 2. (data folder)  to the
root folder of skyrim where the TESV.exe is and replace exsisting files if ask you to

start the game with skyrim launcher and chek the file   barbarian.esp

when ingame open console and write 

bat barbarian 

you will get
1. barbarian armor
2. barbarian gauntlets
3. barbarian boots
4. Skyforge Steel Sword
5. Steel Horned Helmet

armor works only with male. and best with heavy body

I have change  
(ArmorDraugrCuirass) ancient nord armor  with the  new combined mesh
(ArmorDraugrGauntlets) ancient nord gauntlets  with the  (ClothesExecutionergloves) Executioner\'s gloves new combined mesh
(ArmorDraugrBoots) ancient nord boots  with the  (ClothesExecutionerboots) Executioner\'s boots
and i have also made some new meshes textures for armor and gauntlets

becouse i didnt like the ancient nord armor.
author: cokla
